thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Perfect Gem - Review
thread.title_full: A Perfect Gem - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: William D
title: A Perfect Gem - Review
text:
Just a five minute walk to Times Square, the Casablanca is a wonderful place to start a pleasant visit to New York City. Though the rooms are somewhat small compared to present day standards, they offer all of the niceties one might expect. Comfortable beds, real glasses rather than plastic cups and wonderful chocolates on the pillows at night. We were in room 303 just one floor up from the breakfast room where wine, cheese and assorted crackers were served each afternoon. In the morning the room was abuzz with friendly staff offering juices, hard boiled eggs, pastries and wonderful coffee. They also had big machine for espresso or cappuccino.
A wonderful visit would certainly recommend the Casablanca to anyone looking for a pleasant place to stay while in NYC.
